Work

Gumroad.com

2014 - Present

At Gumroad we’re building a company that helps creators earn a living doing what they love.

Over the last year we’ve shipped a ton of stuff. This is taste of what I’ve worked on there.

  • Reading
  • Analytics
  • Mobile Apps
  • Marketing
  • Physical Goods
  • Other

Reading

The web reading experience was one of the first projects I took on at gumroad. Prior to building this the only option a consumer had was to download the file and figure out on their own how to consume it. Not ideal. Starting around this time was also the start of a shift in focus at Gumroad where we wanted to not only build the best selling experience for creators but also build an awesome consumption experience for their audience. We had already started this for films, now it was time to do it for reading. Our goal was to build an experience for the web that was just as powerful as the experience in a native app like kindle or ibooks. It’s mobile friendly too. Led design and front-end development.

& more soon

This stuff takes timeeeee
